cast.overview: On one random day in the San Fernando Valley, a dying father, a young wife, a male caretaker, a famous lost son, a police officer in love, a boy genius, an ex-boy genius, a game show host and an estranged daughter will each become part of a dazzling multiplicity of plots, but one story.
cast.title: Magnolia

details.biography: Jeremy Blackman is an American actor and musician. He starred in the 1999 film Magnolia. He graduated from Columbia University in 2009. He was the lead vocalist for the alternative dance and indie electronic band Pink Drink. He produced experimental music as William Irish. His father, Ian, is also an actor.
details.name: Jeremy Blackman
